text: Hi, I’m Frankie Hayward.
I’m in London with NET-A-PORTER
for  The Fashion Challenge.
I’m going to be styling
Zimmermann’s  sustainable collection,
and other  investment pieces,
to make three  different looks
for three  different occasions.
Challenge number one:
It’s the first day  of your vacation
and you’re heading  straight from the beach
to sunset dinner and drinks (sounds nice).
What do you wear to seamlessly transition between the two?
So… I’ll probably be
wearing a swimming  costume or my bikini.
OK, I’m going to try this
because I think I can  put that on super-quickly
and… yep, perfect, I have a swimsuit.
Let’s go try it on.
Perfect.
I do really like these  shoes, but I think
I’m going to try  another option.
Yeah, I think these  are much better.
I really like the white shoe with the white dress.
I feel like trying on sunglasses is quite a personal thing so...
if I look ridiculous don’t laugh for a second.
This is the [pair of]  glasses that I’m going for.
I think this could be  really lovely for evening.
Now I just need a bag.
Absolutely love this Loewe bag – and it’s perfect,
because I can just put  my sunglasses in there.
Challenge number two:
You have a long-overdue  day off from rehearsals
and are planning  a day in the city.
What do you  wear to feel
cool and comfortable  in the summer heat?
I think it would be nice to wear something with a bit more color.
And something that’s going to just be really light and breezy.
I’m kind of drawn to the stripes on this.
I think this is quite  chic and elegant,
but also going to be  super-easy to wear.
So… shoes to wear  with this dress:
these Chloé sandals.
They look really  fun and funky
and I just think they could add a little bit of height to me,
because I’m quite small.
This is exactly  what I would want
to wear for a  day in the city
because it  can get so hot
and I’m a  little bit taller,
which is always good.
Super-versatile.
Love it!
OK, so now  for accessories.
I already saw this  bag earlier,
so I know exactly which  bag I’m going to choose
– and it’s this one  by The Row,
because I love the color
and it’s actually  a really great size.
I can put my phone in there and a few other bits.
I’m choosing these  Gucci sunglasses
because I have  them already
and I really,  really love them.
Maybe I want a necklace.
These Stone & Strand  necklaces are really cute –
and work really well because they’re
not too overpowering with my earrings.
Final challenge:
It’s wedding season  and you’re deciding
what to wear to your best  friend’s garden-party wedding.
What do you choose to  look elegant in the sun?
Since it’s a wedding,  I’m probably going
to avoid the  white outfits.
So let’s have a  look for something
a bit more colorful.
I do love this.
It’s an amazing colour,
but I think I want  a different shape.
I feel best in a dress at a wedding.
Think I’m going to try this – I really love the colors.
Definitely going to put some heels with it.
Excited to see  how this looks.
I love this.
It’s such a cool shape – it feels really cute
and different, actually.
I think it looks really good with the white heel.
I definitely know which bag I’m choosing…
I think this one is  absolutely perfect –
this Alaïa bag.
It looks great with the outfit, but it’s also very cute
and very perfect  for a wedding.
That’s my Fashion Challenge  for NET-A-PORTER done.
Hope you enjoyed it.
